Plot: When three blue collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash they make a plan to keep their find from the authorities but find complications and mistrust weaving its way into their plan.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 22 nominations.
Title: A Simple Plan
Writer: Scott B. Smith (novel), Scott B. Smith (screenplay)
Actors: Bill Paxton, Bridget Fonda, Billy Bob Thornton, Brent Briscoe
